review.comment: Excellent service! Trusted tradesmen.  Our stairs and landing look like new!! I would highly recommend!

I recently employed the services of Property Clean to clean some carpets in my house. I dealt with the owner Ceiron,  who was extremely professional and very friendly. He was always very prompt in any of our communications and on the day we arranged for the job, he turned up on time and explained exactly what was going to happen. He was very efficient and the job was completed in less than an hour. I am so impressed with the way the carpets have turned out! I was thinking of replacing the one carpet if it didn’t clean up ok but after Ceiron had cleaned it, it looks almost like new! I thought the price he charged was very reasonable and I would not hesitate to thoroughly recommend him and his company.
review.review_reply:
Hi Martine

Thanks for taking the time to leave us this lovely detailed 5 star review.

Im glad you were happy with our cleaning services recently.

Thanks again

Ceiron
Property Cleaning Carpet Cleaning Services

review.comment: I had stained my carpet with oil. I contacted the company and Ceiron was prompt to respond. Ceiron arrived on time and was very professional and approachable. He assessed the stain and was very honest in saying that due to the material of the carpet and the type of stain, he felt the treatment was unlikely to work. I feel a lot of businesses may not be so honest about the effectiveness and would have completed the service and changed with no difference made to the stain. After deciding not to go ahead with the service, Ceiron left without charging for fuel, time, etc. Would definitely recommend this company and would contact again if required.
review.review_reply:
Thanks Holly for taking the time to leave us such a detailed 5 star review.

We are always honest with our customers and if that means us not doing the work as we feel we could not make the stain any better then that is something we always do.

I appreciate you leaving us this lovely review

Thanks again

Ceiron
Property Cleaning Carpet Cleaning Services

review.comment: Really happy with the standard of cleaning on our carpet, I was contemplating buying a new one, no need like new again

Property Clean Carpet Cleaning Services

review.comment: As I have a severe allergy to cats, I needed the carpets cleaning in my new house as soon as I moved in last week. I have carpet in three rooms, so arranged a deep clean. It was very easy to arrange and Ceiron got back to me straight away. He even hoovered all of the other rooms for me with no extra charge, and even left a large industrial fan in order to speed up the drying process, so that I could get all my stuff in and set up my sofa. Amazing service, very friendly and professional. Would highly recommend.  Thanks so much to Ceiron for the fantastic service.

review.comment: Nice boys. But  Difficult  carpet  to clean so they said  berber carpet  !  haven't a clue  . Looks a bit  better but still.loads of marks & stains & still smelling of dog but improved  🐕  .  next time maybe  I'll just change the carpets .
review.review_reply:
Hi I'm very surprised at this review and find it slightly unfair as I stated on the phone before the job that urine marks wouldn't come out of a wool carpet and that I would never guarantee stain removal

I even spoke to you at the time explaining that due to the age of the stains and it was unknown what DIY products had been used (as it was clear alot had been) they wouldn't come out.

We removed over 50 pen and make up marks from the one room and you said you were happy with what we'd done.

A 3 star review like this is heavily damaging to our complete 5star reputation especially due to these circumstances and there was no contact with us to discuss you being unhappy.

review.comment: Had my carpet cleaned today by these guys, and I wad very impressed. Using a high end cleaning device, my living and dining room, hall, stairs, landing and daughters bedroom was cleaned within and hour and reasonably priced too. My carpets now look brand new and smell amazing. Highly recommended.
